writer.name: 阿丽娜·玛拉兹 Alina Marazzi

director.name: 阿丽娜·玛拉兹 Alina Marazzi

this_title: Anna Piaggi una visionaria nella moda
introduction: Celebrated for her eccentric outfits, and an intimate friend of designers Karl Lagerfeld, Dolce & Gabbana, de Castelbajac, and Manolo Blahnik, Anna Piaggi was the living testament to the connections between art, society, and culture. She changed fashion and helped grow her passion on a global scale. Here is the story of an amazing journalist.
foreign_title: Anna Piaggi una visionaria nella moda
